name: Bird simulator (itch)
description:
You are bird trying to get back to your lover! Flap your way through the city and join again with your love in the beautiful activity of reproduction.

Controls: A/D

Tip 1: Try to keep your flaps slow and steady and flap with both wings at the same time for best results!

Tip 2: You can also press space to upright yourself!

Thanks to everyone who helped make this game and thank you for playing it!
